meanings.definition: Engage in a controversial debate or argument.
meanings.sent1: She polemizes with her classmates about the best way to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The politicians polemize over the new law during the debate.
meanings.sent3: The siblings polemize playfully over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: His writing polemizes against injustice in society.
meanings.sent5: The author polemizes passionately in her latest book.

meanings.definition: Express strong opinions in a contentious manner.
meanings.sent1: He polemizes his views on climate change during the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The radio host polemizes about politics on his show every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat polemizes loudly when it doesn't get its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork polemizes the complexities of human emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher polemizes her thoughts on education in the staff meeting.
